DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Style 410 Silicone-Filled Breast Implant Study
DOC.criteria: Female , age 18 year old Patients seek primary breast augmentation ( i.e. , previous breast implant surgery ) indicate follow : Patient dissatisfaction size shape breast ( e.g. , mammary hypoplasia ) , asymmetry , ptosis , aplasia Patients seek breast reconstruction Patients seek breast revisionaugmentation Patients seek breast revisionreconstruction Adequate tissue available cover implant Patients must willing undergo MRI 1 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 10year followup visit ( serial MRI ) . The patient must eligible MRI ( example , implant metal metal device history severe claustrophobia may make ineligible MRI ) . Advanced fibrocystic disease consider premalignant without accompany subcutaneous mastectomy Existing carcinoma breast , without mastectomy Abscess infection body time enrollment Pregnant nursing Have disease , include uncontrolled diabetes ( e.g. , Hb AIc > 8 % ) , clinically know impact wound heal ability Show tissue characteristic clinically incompatible mammaplasty , tissue damage result radiation , inadequate tissue , compromise vascularity ulceration Have , treatment , condition may constitute unwarranted surgical risk ( e.g. , unstable cardiac pulmonary problem ) Show psychological characteristic may incompatible surgical procedure prosthesis , inappropriate attitude motivation ( e.g. , body dysmorphic disorder ) Are willing undergo surgery revision , medically require
